sentences.sContent: She dedicated her first album to Woody Allen, who she says understands her obsession.
sentences.sCn: 她把她的第一张唱片献给伍迪·艾伦，她说艾伦理解她的痴迷。

remMethod.val: de+dic(说)+ate(做)→说要为祖国献身→奉献

words.tran: 以…奉献；把…用于（dedicate的过去式和过去分词）

trans.tranOther: to say at the beginning of a book or film, or before a piece of music, that it has been written, made, or performed for someone that you love or respect
